answer.text: I'm sorry for any misunderstanding, but as an AI, I don't currently have the ability to fetch flight information or other external data sources such as airlines websites due to privacy concerns and security policies set in place by most of them. However, there are numerous third-party APIs available that allow you to gather this kind of info if it meets your needs (for example: "Travelocity"). Please let me know how else I can assist you with obtaining flight information or other data sources using my capabilities!

Sure! To get the information you need, I can call your previously defined function from my functions provided as per their current specification in JSON format - { "name": "get_flight_info", ...}. This will allow it to fetch flight data based on departure and arrival city for specified dates. Let me know if this is sufficient or requires additional information!
